thread.title: Experience the allure of Siem Reap in 36 hours (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Experience the allure of Siem Reap in 36 hours (VIDEO)

title: Experience the allure of Siem Reap in 36 hours (VIDEO)
text:
Experience the allure of Siem Reap in 36 hours (VIDEO) Thursday July 23, 2015 
NEW YORK, July 23 ― Beyond Angkor Wat, Siem Reap has its own allure, with enticing dining options, stylish shops, genial residents and a laid-back river town ambiance. ― New York Times 
The temple of Angkor Wat in Siem Reap, Cambodia, is travellers' favourite monument. ― File pic More Stories for You:
